About

What the heck are you over here for?! It's a blog post, there is nothing else to know about. Get you're butt back where it belongs on the blog side of the page.

I'm serious. Don't make me ask you again. Click the blog button (upper right hand side of the screen. It is a BIG BLUE BUTTON, you can't miss it. Seriously go. Now.

Really?

The poop is wrong with you? Get out of here. You must have been dropped on your head at birth, the only plausable cause of you still being here. You poor thing. Just click the X button in your browser and take a nap. Or call a home. Anything to get you off this page.

Fine. Be that way. I give up. I'm gonna go do something more productive than talking to a brick wall. Like watching paint dry. Or repeatedly hitting my head against a wall. Best of luck with that thing you were doing. Nice knowing you. NOT!
